def_cn: 巡回访问;巡回演出；巡回比赛
def_en: A tour is an organized trip that people such as musicians, politicians, or theatre companies go on to several different places, stopping to meet people or perform.

def_cn: 作巡回活动(或演出、比赛)
def_en: When people such as musicians, politicians, or theatre companies tour, they go on a tour, for example in order to perform or to meet people.
A tour is a journey during which you visit several places that interest you.

def_cn: （短时间的）游览，参观,观光
def_en: A tour is a short trip that you make round a place, for example round a historical building, so that you can look at it.
If you tour a place, you go on a journey or trip round it.
